short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick reference for common Excel formulas.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Excel Formulas Guide Chrome extension provides a quick and comprehensive reference for common and advanced Excel formulas. With categorized lists and hoverable tooltips, users can easily view formula syntax and understand their functionality. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone working with Excel, this tool makes formula lookup simple and efficient directly from your browser!
